INIT_OPTIONS_ERROR: [ERROR]: VWO-SDK {date} Options should be of type object
INIT_OPTIONS_SDK_KEY_ERROR: [ERROR]: VWO-SDK {date} Please provide the sdkKey in the options and should be a of type string
INIT_OPTIONS_ACCOUNT_ID_ERROR: [ERROR]: VWO-SDK {date} Please provide VWO account ID in the options and should be a of type string|number
INIT_OPTIONS_INVALID: Invalid {key} passed in options. Should be of type: {correctType} and greater than equal to {value}
INVALID_POLLING_CONFIGURATION: Invalid {key} passed in options. Should be of type: {correctType} and greater than equal to {value}
ERROR_FETCHING_SETTINGS: Settings could not be fetched. Error: {err}
INVALID_SETTINGS_SCHEMA: Settings are not valid. Failed schema validation
POLLING_FETCH_SETTINGS_FAILED: Error while fetching VWO settings with polling
INVALID_PARAM: {key} passed to {apiName} API is not of valid type. Got type: {type}, should be: {correctType}
API_SETTING_INVALID: Settings are not valid. Contact VWO Support
API_CONTEXT_INVALID: Context should be an object and must contain a mandatory key - id, which is User ID
USER_ID_NULL: UserId: No user ID was provided, and using the device ID as a fallback is currently disabled. Operations requiring a user ID may not function as expected.
FEATURE_NOT_FOUND: Feature not found for the key: {featureKey}
EVENT_NOT_FOUND: Event: {eventName} not found in any of the features metrics
STORED_DATA_ERROR: Error in getting data from storage. Error: {err}
INVALID_GATEWAY_URL: Please provide a valid URL for VWO Gateway Service
NETWORK_CALL_FAILED: Error occurred while sending {method} request. Error: {err}
BATCH_UPLOAD_ERROR: Event batch could not be uploaded. Error: {err}
DATABASE_ERROR: Error while performing database operation. Error: {err}
ATTRIBUTES_NOT_FOUND: {key} passed to the {apiName} API is empty. Please provide {expectedFormat}.
ERROR_SETTING_SEGMENTATION_CONTEXT: Error in setting contextual data for segmentation. Got error: {err}
USER_AGENT_VALIDATION_ERROR: Failed to validate User Agent. Error: {err}
USER_AGENT_PRE_SEGMENT_ERROR: To evaluate user agent related segments, please pass userAgent in context object
SETTINGS_FETCH_FAILED: Failed to fetch settings and hence VWO client instance couldn't be updated when API: {apiName} got called having isViaWebhook param as {isViaWebhook}. Error: {err}
LOCATION_PRE_SEGMENT_ERROR: To evaluate location pre Segment, please pass ipAddress in context object
GATEWAY_DATA_FETCH_ERROR: Error while fetching data from gateway. Error: {err}
STORAGE_READ_ERROR: Error while reading from storage. Error: {err}
STORAGE_WRITE_ERROR: Error while writing to storage. Error: {err}
DECODE_SDK_KEY_ERROR: Failed to decode sdkKey from storage. Error: {err}
INVALID_BATCH_EVENTS_CONFIG: Invalid batch events config, should be an object, eventsPerRequest should be a number greater than 0 and requestTimeInterval should be a number greater than 0
ATTRIBUTES_MAP_ERROR: Attributes map must contain atleast 1 key-value pair
ATTRIBUTES_MAP_INVALID: Attributes should be an object containing key-value pairs
BATCHING_NOT_ENABLED: Batching is not enabled. Pass batchEventData in the SDK configuration while invoking init API.
NETWORK_CALL_FAILED_AFTER_MAX_RETRIES: Max retries reached. Request failed for {endPoint}, Error: {err}
ATTEMPTING_RETRY_FOR_FAILED_NETWORK_CALL: Request failed for {endPoint}, Error: {err}. Retrying in {delay} seconds, attempt {attempt} of {maxRetries}
ERROR_STORING_DATA_IN_STORAGE: Error in to store data into storage. Error: {err}
NETWORK_CALL_FAILURE_AFTER_MAX_RETRIES_F: Network call for {extraData} failed after {attempts} retry attempt(s). Got Error: {err}
NETWORK_CALL_FAILURE_AFTER_MAX_RETRIES: Network call for {extraData} failed after {attempts} retry attempt(s). Got Error: {err}
INVALID_USER_AGENT_IN_CONTEXT_FOR_PRE_SE: To Evaluate UserAgent segmentation, please provide userAgent in context
SETTINGS_MANAGER_NOT_INITIALIZED: Settings Manager was not initialized while calling {api}
GET_ALIAS_AFTER_SET_ERROR: Failed to retrieve alias after setting. Error: {error}
ALIAS_FEATURE_DISABLED: Alias feature is not enabled. Enable it while initializing the SDK
ALIAS_FEATURE_DISABLED_GATEWAY: Alias feature is disabled. Configure Gateway Service while initializing the SDK
ALIAS_SAME_AS_TEMPID: Alias ID:{aliasId} should not be same as temp Id:{tempId}
ALIASES_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY: Alias ID cannot be empty or blank
